column2: Promote a young statesmen to serve in your courts.
Persuade a young warrior to fight for your cause.
Invite a promising steward to court, to aid with matters of administration.
Call forth a spymaster from your rings to advise you.
Scour the land for a priest to join my court and advise me on religious matters.
A young noblewoman who has caught your eye makes her début at a formal ball.
A young scion who has caught your attention makes his début at court.
Awaken a Tomb King to rule over parts of your land in your stead.
